ingredients: 1 c. diced sweet potatoes (a small dice is best)
1 jalapeno or 2 Indian green chiles, seeded and minced
1 and 1/2 c. cooked chickpeas (equal to one 15 oz. can)
about 1 and 1/2 c. diced tomatoes (equal to one 14 oz. can)
1 tsp. coconut sugar or brown sugar
fresh lime juice (lemon also works), for serving
